children.subject: I'm taking EE97 instead, with my faculty advisor who's in the EECS department.
How did you resolve this? Just curious

history.content:
I tried filling out this link to obtain authorization from Prof. Hilfinger for an internship over the summer. However my major is Engineering Physics and that doesn't seem to be an option on the form. My advisor said I can get the form signed by any department, and since my internship is most closely related to CS, I thought this would be the best way forward. Is there anything I can do about this? Is it alright if I get authorization from a Engineering Physics faculty advisor and still get the CCN for CS97?

Edit: Resolved
history.subject: Regarding CPT Authorization for a different major
